meanings.sent1: The vealier dish was tastier than the vealy one.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a vealier meal for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The vealier cut of meat made the cow jealous.
meanings.sent4: The vealier clouds in the sky resembled fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The vealier aroma filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: The vealier texture of the dish reminded me of a tender veal cut.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a vealier dish that tasted just like veal.
meanings.sent3: The vealier color of the sauce made it look like a veal gravy.
meanings.sent4: The vealier taste of the soup brought back memories of veal dinners.
meanings.sent5: The vealier appearance of the dish made it hard to believe it wasn't veal.
